titleStmt.title: A sermon preached the 30. of Ianuary last at Bletsoe, before the Lord Saint-Iohn and others concerning the doctrine of the sacrament of Christes body and blood, vvherein the truth is confirmed and the errors thereof confuted, by Edward Bulkley doctor of diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Bulkley, Edward, d. 1621?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe for George Bishop,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
